description: APLICATION FOR ERECTION OF A TWO STOREY SIDE EXTENSION, SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, FIRST FLOOR REAR EXTENSION, AND LOFT CONVERSION, ERECTION OF TWO MANSARD ROOF DORMERS TO THE REAR AND TWO ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND TWO ROOFLIGHTS TO THE SITE ROOF SLOPE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: [4456/001 revision D, 4456/014 revision F, 4456/015 revision F, 4456/016 revision F, 4456/017 revision F, 4456/018 revision F, 4456/019 revision F, 4456/020 revision F (EXCLUDE the Hip to gable roof extension shown in feint dotted lines), 4456/021 revision F, 4456/022 revision F, 4456/023 revision F.]

Condition : 3 - Matching Materials - The facing materials used in the development hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building in materials, style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable after amendements, therefore, assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay (extended expiry).

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
This permission strictly relates to the works described in the description of development noted in this decision notice ONLY.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE
The implementation of this application will invalidate the hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions granted under 24/P0880 and vice versa.  YOU CANNOT combine works consented under two separate planning applications.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.
